data.content:
noun
plural -tials
[count] a quality, skill, or experience that makes a person suited to do a job
My experience as a manager is my strongest credential.
usually plural
What are your credentials? [=qualifications]
her impressive academic/professional credentials
a document which shows that a person is qualified to do a particular job
(US) a teaching credential [=(more commonly) certificate]
usually plural
The doctor showed us her credentials.
press credentials [=documents which show that a person is a journalist]
